content.rendered:
Rerformatted with new cover

We all possess the powerful evolutionary force of Kundalini that can open us to genius states, psychic powers and cosmic consciousness.

As the energies of the Aquarian Age intensify, more and more people are experiencing spontaneous Kundalini releases that are incredibly powerful and sometimes startling. This book shows you how to release your Kundalini gradually and safely.

The section on Chakras brings new understanding to these “dials” on our life machine (body). It is the most comprehensive information available for cleansing and developing the Chakras and their energies.
